name: A. Binary Matrix
statement:
A matrix is called binary if all its elements are either 0 or 1.Ecrade
calls a binary matrix A if the following two properties hold: The
bitwise XOR of all numbers in each row of matrix A is equal to 0. The
bitwise XOR of all numbers in each column of matrix A is equal to 0.
Ecrade has a binary matrix of size n
cdot m. He is interested in the minimum number of elements that need to
be changed for the matrix to become .However, it seems a little
difficult, so please help him!
hint: Hint Do we really have to consider the problem on the whole matrix?
